FuncDef: The display mpls ldp lsp statistics command displays statistics about LDP LSPs.
CLIs: display mpls ldp lsp statistics vpn-instance <vpn-instance-name>

ParaDef.Info:
Displays events that LDP adjacencies in a specified VPN instance go Down.
-

Examples: VPNInstanceName   Total   Ingress   Transit   Egress   Liberal  FRR
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The display mpls ldp lsp statistics command displays statistics about LDP LSPs; the display mpls lsp statistics command displays statistics about all types of LSPs.
